#include <stdio.h>

#include <iostream>

#define max 500007

using namespace std;
int getchar_unlocked( void );
//inline int getchar_unlocked() { return getchar(); }
inline void fastRead_int(int &x) {
    register int c = getchar_unlocked();
    x = 0;
    int neg = 0;

    for(; ((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-'); c = getchar_unlocked());

    if(c=='-') {
    	neg = 1;
    	c = getchar_unlocked();
    }

    for(; c>47 && c<58 ; c = getchar_unlocked()) {
    	x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;
    }

    if(neg)
    	x = -x;
}








unsigned long a[max];
bool exceeded[max];
unsigned long mod = 10000;



int main(){

    for (int i = 1; i < max; i++) a[i] = 1;    // ini all a[i] = 1

    for (int i = 2; i < max;i++){              // as the seive() also tells us about the divisiors of a number
        for (int j = i*2;j<max;j+=i){
            a[j] *= i;                         // taking product of all divisiors of j
            if (a[j] >= mod){                  // taking mod if a[j] exceeds 10000
                exceeded[j] = true;            // marking which numbers are exceeded
                a[j] %= mod;
            }
        }
    }
    int t;
//    scanf("%d",&t);
fastRead_int(t);
    while(t--){
        int n;
       // scanf("%d",&n);
       fastRead_int(n);

        if(exceeded[n])
        {
            printf("%04lu\n",a[n]);
        }
        else {
            printf("%lu\n",a[n]);
        }
    }
}
